abstract: Bill Gates unveiled a partnership with the Ford Motor Company to build Microsoft technology into several Ford models.
snippet: Bill Gates unveiled a partnership with the Ford Motor Company to build Microsoft technology into several Ford models.
lead_paragraph: LAS VEGAS, Jan. 7 — Bill Gates, the chairman of Microsoft, is using the Consumer Electronics Show here to highlight several new consumer-oriented products and to unveil a partnership with the Ford Motor Company to build Microsoft technology into several Ford models.
